Help:Node.title: General Concepts
Help:Node.Log:Description:
GENERAL CONCEPTS: List of General Concepts
The following help articles cover a number of general
concepts to assist you:
Overview:
* help - overview of help related commands
* help basics - help for the new player
* help topics - list of all help topics
* help fun - how to have fun
* help theme - overview of theme and background
Communications:
* help cnpcs - talking to computer NPCs
* help communicate - learning to communicate
* help emotion - better ways to express emotions
* help adverb - how to add adverbs to commands
* help language - how to use alternative languages
Objects:
* help perception - help on perception of objects
* help manipulation - help on manipulation of objects
* help clustering - how to deal with many objects
* help details - overview of how details work
* help room - overview of room related commands
* help bulk - help on weight and bulk
* help clothing - how clothing works
* help alteration - how clothing can be changed
* help eating - how food works
Movement:
* help movement - how to move from place to place
* help proximity - help on moving near objects
* help gait - using different types of gaits
* help stance - choices of stances
* help gesture - expressing emotions through gestures
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Character Information:
* help skills - help on character skills
* help combat - overview of combat
* help health - help on injury and healing
* help death - understanding death
}Role- Playing:
* help roleplaying - overview of roleplaying concepts
* help consent - describes consensual roleplaying
* help memory - using character memory
* help character - overview of In-Character (IC) vs.
Out-Of- Character (OOC)
Misc:
* help custom - help on customizing
* help friends - help on editing friend lists
* help credits - game credits
* help bugs - how to report bugs and offer ideas
